news.content:
‚ú® New ThreeFold Now Marketplace Solution! Video Chat is a Zoom-alternative built on top of the TF Grid. Click here to try it out!

‚ú® Testnet 2.3 - Testers WANTED! We need your help, dear community, to try our solutions on testnet and give us feedback on your experience. Join the tester group here üí™

üî• Try to deploy 3Bot on testnet here üî• Try to deploy a TF Now solution here üî• Manual for deployment here

‚ú® Have you seen our new TF Capacity Explorer? We have a new TF Capacity Explorer site where we showcase ALL nodes from around the world, whether on mainnet, testnet, or devnet. One website for all!

‚ö°Ô∏è What‚Äôs next?

‚ö°Ô∏è We are gearing up to bring Grid 2.3 to Mainnet! üî•üî•üî•

ü•òü•òü•ò There are many things cooking in the background, look out for more updates.
news.excerpt: Some quick product management highlights for you, within, & a major thank you to everyone working so hard on these products and solutions every day!
